name: Sunnymaurya.github.com
body:
# I majored in computer engineering at [NSIT-Delhi](http://www.nsit.ac.in/) and worked in analytics at Mu Sigma. 

I did my schooling from [DAV Public School](http://www.davvasantkunj.org/) ,Vasant kunj,New Delhi
My [facebook profile](https://www.facebook.com/sunnykumar.maurya.1?ref=tn_tnmn).
Follow me on [twitter](https://twitter.com/sunnykmaurya).
Connect with me on [Linkedin](http://in.linkedin.com/pub/sunny-kumar-maurya/23/670/760).

I participated in the [Delhi Data Bootcamp](http://delhi.dbootcamp.org/).

I participated in Karmany's [Social Design Hackathon](http://karmany.org/socialdesignjam/) and our team created [this](https://www.dropbox.com/s/dbyrsukbtukjyot/EI%20Social%20Design%20Hackathon-%20Solution.pdf?dl=0) solution for Educational Initiatives.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
